text: Bagbera is a census town in Purbi Singhbhum district in the state of Jharkhand, India. It comes under Greater Jamshedpur Plan. ==Demographics== India census, Bagbera had a population of 1,05,185. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Bagbera has an average literacy rate of 66%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 59% of the males and 41% of females literate. 14% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in East Singhbhum district
title: Bagbera
